capstone.ui

Class ButtonSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window
      • capstone.ui.Widget
        • capstone.ui.ButtonSlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

    public class ButtonSlot
extends Widget
    A Widget containing a Panel to which Buttons or optionally other Components or Widgets can be added.

      • ButtonSlot

        public ButtonSlot(boolean vertical)
        Constructs an empty ButtonSlot with the specified orientation.
        Parameters:
        vertical - Whether to have the ButtonSlot have a vertical Panel layout as opposed to a horizontal one.

      • ButtonSlot

                  com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Button... buttons)

        vertical - Whether to have the ButtonSlot have a vertical Panel layout as opposed to a horizontal one.
        buttons - An array of buttons to add to the ButtonSlot.

                  ButtonSlot.Kind... buttons)

        buttons - An array of buttons to add to the ButtonSlot.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component component)
        Adds a component and also adds some spacing. Whether the spacing is horizontal or vertical (i.e. below or to the right of the Widget) depends on the orientation of the ButtonSlot.
        Overrides:
        add in class Widget
        Parameters:
        component - The component to add.

      • add

        public void add(Widget widget)
        Adds a widget and also adds some spacing. Whether the spacing is horizontal or vertical (i.e. below or to the right of the Widget) depends on the orientation of the ButtonSlot.
        Overrides:
        add in class Widget
        Parameters:
        widget - The widget to add.
